Identification_Area.title: Overview of the Apollo 17 Lunar Surface Experiments Package (ALSEP)

Citation_Information.description: This document provides an overview of the Apollo 17 Lunar Surface Experiments Package (ALSEP).

Modification_Detail.description: Creation. Extracted text the PDS3 catalog.

External_Reference.reference_text: Apollo 17 Preliminary Science Report, NASA SP-330, published by NASA, Washington, D.C., 1973.
Bates, J.R., W.W. Lauderdale, and H. Kernaghan, ALSEP Termination Report, NASA Reference Publication Series, NASA RF-1036, published by NASA Johnson Space Center, Houston, Texas, Apr. 1979.
Davies, M.E., and T.R. Colvin, Lunar coordinates in the regions of the Apollo landers, Journal of Geophysical Research, Volume 105, Issue E8, pages 20,227-20,280, 2000.

Document.acknowledgement_text: Document provided by the NASA Space Science Data Coordinated Archive (NSSDCA, formerly NSSDC)
